name: PropertyController_GetPropertiesPhotos
description: A collection showing all the photos linked to a specific block, property or room

token.description: The login token returned from the /session POST call

propertyID.description: The unique ID of the Property

offset.description: The index of the first item to return

count.description: The maximum number of items to return (up to 1000 per request)

$block: Holds results from a paged query returning LandlordPhotoModel values

$ul: **Count**: The total number of results available for all pages
**Data**: The resulting data returned from the paged query range
